  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.Image

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bar, Button, CastBar, GameCursor, InfoField, InfoWindow, InterfaceTile, Message, ObjectSwitch, PointsField, Portrait, ScrollableList, Slot, Switch, TextBox, TextInput, TextSwitch

    public abstract class InterfaceObject
extends org.newdawn.slick.Image
    Abstract super class for all interface objects
